metadata.description: The program starts with an Ojos de AmÃ©rica documentary about domestic violence in Chile, with interviews with children who have been victimized. Next, the program focuses on crime prevention in Edmonton with a segment on Edmonton's Crime Stoppers organization and an interview with a sargeant from Edmonton's police force. Then, there is a lesson on how to play the zampoÃ±a, traditional musical instrument from the Andes region of South America. Finally, there is a brief sports segment.
